definitions: To make bread or other food crisp and brown by exposure to radiant heat.
To warm oneself by a fire or other source of heat.
To drink to the health or in honor of (someone or something) by raising one's glass along with others.
To propose a toast to (someone or something).
examples: I like to toast bread for breakfast.
She toasted her feet by the fire.
He toasted his success with champagne.
